data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Here Be Kobolds!
data.detailed_description:
Here Be Kobolds!

A pack of Kobold minions for your Dragons!
This product includes:
  • Kobold_Archer_Black[black,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Archer_Blue[blue,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Archer_Green[green,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Archer_Red[red,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Archer_White[white,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Caster_Black[black,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Caster_Blue[blue,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Caster_Green[green,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Caster_Red[red,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Caster_White[white,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Cleric_Black[black,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Cleric_Blue[blue,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Cleric_Green[green,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Cleric_Red[red,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Cleric_White[white,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Knight_Black[black,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Knight_Blue[blue,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Knight_Green[green,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Knight_Red[red,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Knight_White[white,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Paragon_Black[black,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Paragon_Blue[blue,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Paragon_Green[green,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Paragon_Red[Red,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Paragon_White[white,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Sneak_Black[black,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Sneak_Blue[blue,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Sneak_Green[green,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Sneak_Red[Red,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Sneak_White[white,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Sorcerer_Black[black,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Sorcerer_Blue[blue,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Sorcerer_Green[green,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Sorcerer_Red[red,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Sorcerer_White[white,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Spear_Black[black,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Spear_Blue[blue,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Spear_Green[green,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Spear_Red[Red,kobold,lizard,dragon]
  • Kobold_Spear_white[white,kobold,lizard,dragon]
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity or Fantasy Grounds Classic

data.short_description: Here Be Kobolds! A pack of Kobold minions for your Dragons!This product includes:...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
